body: Find out more about the content of the Kentico MVC - Essentials module

body: Find out about what it means to develop websites in Kentico MVC development model, how Kentico API works, and what options you can use to store data and edit content in Kentico.
pageBody: Find out about what it means to develop websites in Kentico MVC development model, how Kentico API works, and what options you can use to store data and edit content in Kentico.
title: MVC Development Basics

body: Find out how the administration interface stores data and how you can create your own page types.
pageBody: Find out how the administration interface stores data and how you can create your own page types.

body: Find out how you can set up your website to support multiple cultures.
pageBody: Find out how you can set up your website to support multiple cultures.

body: Find out how to set up route templates and page URLs for Kentico MVC websites, and how to serve requests for multilingual content.
pageBody: Find out how to set up route templates and page URLs for Kentico MVC websites, and how to serve requests for multilingual content.
displayTitle: Routing and URLs on Kentico MVC websites

body: Find out how you can retrieve the data stored in the administration interface to the live site.
pageBody: Find out how you can retrieve the data stored in the administration interface to the live site.
displayTitle: Working with content on Kentico MVC websites

body: Find out how you can prepare the applications so content editors can dynamically add content to their navigation menu.
pageBody: Find out how you can prepare the applications so content editors can dynamically add content to their navigation menu.

body: See how you can add and display media files on your website.
pageBody: See how you can add and display media files on your website.

body: Find out how you can add a Not found page to handle 404 types of errors.
